Class StoryViewStrategy

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
com.tron_master.tron.view.game_view.GameArea
com.tron_master.tron.view.game_view.StoryViewStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class StoryViewStrategy extends GameArea
Story mode game view (manages FXML loading, UI components, and game canvas)

    • showGameOverScreen

      public void showGameOverScreen()
      Renders all portals on the canvas. Portals extend Wall, so they use the same renderer.
